name: UltraPaintball
description:
UltraPaintball is a FREE multiplayer game that wants the most INMERSIVE experience.

The game is about a paintball simulation. 

You can create a room, then enter with your friends and finally just have fun :) 

Capture the zone:It consists of capturing the area marked in red. The ammo is limited and to get more you have to capture the hill and wait for the airdrop. Then you will have to scroll with the mouse and reload the magazines bullet by bullet with - T-.

Team Deathmatch:Start with 500 ammo in a little map.

It is now in development and the servers are empty, but if you want, you can give it a TRY with your friends.

I have a lot of ideas to add in this game like and level system, more weapons, maps and modes but requires time.

Update:

*Graphic improvements

*Main menu improvements

* Bugs fixed

*Physical bullet was added:now the shoots are more realistic.

*New gamemode and map

*Select map option was added
